text: Periglypta is a genus of bivalves in the family Veneridae. ==Species== According to the World Register of Marine Species, this genus has seven extant species. There are five fossil species listed in Fossilworks. * Periglypta albocancellata (M. Huber, 2010) *Periglypta caesarina *Periglypta caribbeana * Periglypta corbis (Lamarck, 1818) * Periglypta crispata (Deshayes, 1854) * Periglypta listeri (J.E. Gray, 1838) – Princess Venus clam * Periglypta multicostata (G. B. Sowerby I, 1835) * Periglypta puerpera (Linnaeus, 1771) * Periglypta reticulata (Linnaeus, 1758) *Periglypta tamiamensis *Periglypta tarquinia *Periglypta weegeeree The following two species were listed under Periglypta but are now listed under Antigona: * Periglypta chemnitzi (Hanley, 1845), now Antigona chemnitzii (Hanley, 1845) * Periglypta sowerbyi (Deshayes, 1853), now Antigona sowerbyi (Deshayes, 1854) In addition, Markus Huber (2010) mentioned that Periglypta and Antigona are synonyms, but Chen et al. (2011) rejected this opinion. ==References== Category:Veneridae Category:Bivalves of Asia Category:Bivalve genera
title: Periglypta
